style.name: standard
style.image: max-width: 500px; width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); transition: transform 0.2s ease;

style.name: success
style.image: max-width: 500px; width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border: 2px solid #4CAF50; transition: transform 0.2s ease;

modal.overlay-style: position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 10000;
modal.modal-style: position: relative; max-width: 90%; max-height: 90%; background: white; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
